issue.title: [CF 1182] Problem with tracking "snapshotting" into bleeds (Feral Druid)
issue.body:
My problem is that I want to show an icon for Savage Roar or Tiger's Fury WHEN I apply rip or rake to the target. Nothing seems to work. Spell Casts cannot track either rip or rake, and I don't know what else to use. I tried a combat event to show savage roar/tiger's fury with a condition; IF savage roar is applied to me when rip or rake is refreshed, that seem to make the icon show up, but I can't find any other solution to when i apply rip/rake.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
Expected: Show an icon of Savage Roar / Tiger's Fury IF applied to me WHEN i initially apply Rip/Rake on the target.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
TellMeWhen v7.4.0

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No errors.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)


> Posted by CurseForge user carlstream | Imported from CurseForge issue #1182 | Raw

comments.body:
